conversation_history.content: Act as if you are the human user of an AI application, and I am your AI assistant. Please prompt me with one clear, super short sentence in colloquial language, without greetings or compliments!
Run "Comments: [any valid youtube url]" and you'll get a summary of Youtube comments and how people feel about the video.
Can you run Comments: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ to give me an idea of what people think about this popular video?
Whats the sentiment of the comments for that video, are they mostly positive or negative?
